title: Pam Rose
text:
Pam Rose is an American <a href="country%20music">country music</a> songwriter. In her career, she has been a member of the groups <a href="Calamity%20Jane%20%28band%29">Calamity Jane</a> and <a href="Kennedy%20Rose">Kennedy Rose</a>, both times pairing with fellow songwriter <a href="Mary%20Ann%20Kennedy%20%28American%20singer%29">Mary Ann Kennedy</a>. Rose's co-writing credits include the Grammy Award-nominated songs "<a href="Ring%20on%20Her%20Finger%2C%20Time%20on%20Her%20Hands">Ring on Her Finger, Time on Her Hands</a>" by <a href="Lee%20Greenwood">Lee Greenwood</a> and "<a href="I%27ll%20Still%20Be%20Loving%20You">I'll Still Be Loving You</a>" by <a href="Restless%20Heart">Restless Heart</a>. Other songs that she has written include "<a href="Safe%20in%20the%20Arms%20of%20Love">Safe in the Arms of Love</a>" by <a href="Martina%20McBride">Martina McBride</a> and "<a href="You%20Will%20%28Patty%20Loveless%20song%29">You Will</a>" by <a href="Patty%20Loveless">Patty Loveless</a>.
She has also worked with songwriting for Swedish country singer <a href="Jill%20Johnson">Jill Johnson</a>.
